remarks: An intuitive definition of a neighborhood in terms of interior. (Contributed by Szymon Jaroszewicz, 18-Dec-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
statement:
neifval.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
neiint $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X /\ N C_ X ) -> ( N e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` S ) <-> S C_ ( ( int ` J ) ` N ) ) ) $.
